nodes.text: Davon Kull was a male Human criminal living during the Galactic War. Imprisoned in Belsavis prison by the Galactic Republic, he was among those prisoners who broke free during the Invasion of Belsavis around 3641 BBY. While threatening a Republic guard, he was approached by Lord Kallig, who asked him about the whereabout of the Circle gang.
Davon Kull appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Belsavis.
